participant_1.background:
I love listening to acoustic music, especially when I am with my daughter.
my nickname is bubblegum.
I am not the fittest person, but I run to stay healthy for my baby.
i like to pickle eggs.
I want to drive my truck to the mountains and get some alone time.

participant_2.background:
My mom always told me to eat my vegetables, but I never liked them
I'm afraid of losing my cats.
my favorite video game is halo 3.
I'm a family man from the midwest with a passion for theatre.
I took a long, hot bath at the beach on my last vacation.

content.text: Hello there! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking!
That is good to hear! I am doing well myself!
I see that you are from the midwest. I am from the south!
Yes, I am from the midwest. I am a family man with a passion for theatre.
That is great! I love theatre! I am a musician and I love to play music.
That is awesome! What kind of music do you play?
I play acoustic music. I love to play music with my daughter!
That is great! I love to play video games. My favorite video game is Halo 3.
I have never played Halo 3. I am more of a single player game player.
I understand that. I love to play single player games too. I love to play games like Skyrim and The Witcher 3.
I love The Witcher 3! I have not played Skyrim yet.
I highly recommend Skyrim. It is a great game!
I will have to check it out! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I am always happy to give recommendations!
